title: THE BOURNE TRILOGY - Robert Ludlum. Read Scott Brick {FerraBit}
description:
THE BOURNE TRILOGY by Robert Ludlum

This contains the THREE ORIGINAL JASON BOURNE novels I've ripped:
The Bourne Identity  (1980). http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4903431 
The Bourne Supremacy (1986). http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4930581 
The Bourne Ultimatum (1990). http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4950899 
 
Read by . . : Scott Brick
Publisher . : Books On Tape 
Format . . .: MP3. From 20+ CDs each, 3.17 GB total.
Bitrate . . : ~95 kbps (iTunes 8, VBR (medium-high), mono, 44kHz)
Genre . . . : Thriller Suspense Fiction
Unabridged .: Yessir

Here's the three original Jason Bourne novels, written by Robert Ludlum himself.
See the info.txt files of the book folders for further details.
This torrent is just a combination of the three original books I ripped and have posted separately.

If you have downloaded my other torrents of these books, you can seed this, while seed the others if you like, by using this folder structure (pointing the individual book torrents to their folder in the trilogy).


Labeled by CD, track and chapter. Original CD tracks/format.
PDF and RTF included - ESL, ebook and reference friendly.

Thanks for sharing & caring.
Cheers, FerraBit
June 2009

From Wiki:
In the first book, The Bourne Identity, Jason Bourne suffered amnesia...

At the beginning of The Bourne Supremacy, Bourne has recovered from most mental and all physical injuries and is teaching Asian studies at a university in Maine under his real name of David Webb, and living happily on campus with Marie...

The Bourne Ultimatum is the third Jason Bourne novel, and follows David Webb, alias Jason Bourne, as he works to find his old enemy, Carlos the Jackal, who is trying to kill him. As the Jackal enters old age and his infamy fades, he decides that he will do two things before he dies: kill Webb/Bourne, and destroy the KGB facility of Novgorod, where the Jackal was trained and later turned away...
